mapper.select: SELECT movie_no, movie_nm, rating, genres, runtime FROM movie_t ORDER BY movie_no ASC
SELECT movie_nm, rating, genres, runtime, plot, title_eng, poster_urls FROM movie_t WHERE movie_no = #{movieNo}
SELECT r.time_no, r.start_time, m.movie_no, m.movie_nm, m.runtime FROM movie_t m LEFT OUTER JOIN runtime_t r ON m.movie_no = r.movie_no ORDER BY m.movie_no ASC

SELECT r.time_no, r.movie_no, r.start_time, m.movie_no, m.movie_nm, m.runtime FROM runtime_t r JOIN movie_t m ON r.movie_no = m.movie_no ORDER BY m.movie_no ASC
WHERE movie_no = #{movieNo}
